name: Fruit Link Blast Bubble Pop!
description:
The game Fruit Link Blast Bubble Pop! is very cute, this fruit game is a puzzle game line match, should play very interesting.
Colorful fruit style manga and bright's touch pop the fruit. And the game line fruit fun. This amazing fruit game is the most challenging games in the training speed and reaction. Need to juice fruit by connect line match fruit and achieve the target score before time runs out. Make your fruit cocktail in the best cafeteria and the farm fresh background. For fans of the game style link or line and fruit matching. The fruit that splash this game is a legend of puzzles, fruit and casual games for everyone of all ages. For toddlers, children before school age. There will be more to promote learning. With colorful interesting of fruit farm fruit and piano music cool. Using mobile phones and tablet on learning of the children.
For teenagers girls boys and adults that connect a line of colorful fruit, And solve the difficulty level in each level in the farm supply adventure and puzzle fruits in the legend.

Fruit Property
- Adventure with fresh fruit in farm more than 99 level.
- Delicious juicy fruit beautiful visual image very cool.
- Fun and easy to learn, difficult in a higher level.
- Special fruit can cut the fruit both rows like fruit ninja and get the score increases.

How to play
- Drag the fruits, connect the fruit three or more to clear fruit blast and earn points.
- Score points exceeded the target to levels more difficult.
- To eliminate the more fruits can quickly get the special fruits.
